RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 54. Claiming Purse 17900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 15 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 15 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,5 00.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SURE FIRE READY always within striking distance, rallied steadily two wide through the turn to make the lead entering the stretch, was put to mild right handed urging before the furlong marker and drew off under confident handling to win as much the best. HITCH CITY rushed to a daylight lead soon after the start, set the pace along the inside for a little over a half mile then was no match for the winner while clearly second best. SASSY POWER improved position in upper stretch in the four path. ARTIES CRYPTONITE chased the pace two wide through the turn then faded. CEE CEE'S GOT THIS trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Hitch City
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed clear, set pace top lane, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Sure Fire Ready
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, rallied 2 wide turn, drew off, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Arties Cryptonite
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Sassy Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: improved position 4path

ENTRY.NAME: Cee Cee's Got This
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 22400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 15 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 15 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SERVE REVENGE COLD hit the gate leaving there, angled out two wide on the clubhouse turn, made the lead before a half, set the balance of the pace and drew off through the stretch under strong handling to win as much the best. KARAMEL CORN broke in front and was hustled into the clubhouse turn, set the pace along the inside for nearly a half, chased the winner the balance of the trip and finished second best. SPIN DOCTOR with the second flight three wide, went evenly. BABA LOOEY was antsy in the gate, settled within striking distance inside rivals but failed to respond. DEER CREEK ROAD failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Serve Revenge Cold
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Sadey David
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate start, took over 2 wide backstretch, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Karamel Corn
ENTRY.OWNER: Fulwiler Heather Fulwiler Richard Tieman Diane M and Hutson Bernard
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, hard used, early pace, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Deer Creek Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Baba Looey
ENTRY.COMMENT: antsy gate, close up, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Spin Doctor
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 3 wide, evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 52. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOLD HONEY broke in front then gave up the advantage, shifted out two wide soon after the start, advanced through the turn to make the lead nearing the top of the stretch then drew off under right handed urging to win as much the best. SALTMAKESHERSWEET away alertly, made the lead soon after the start, dropped inside, set the pace along the rail past the quarter pole then was no match for the winner while well clear for second. SNOWBIRD settled in the four path down the backstretch, improved position in the five path entering the stretch and just held on for third. CURLIN PEARLS failed to menace. WHATDID I BUY was no factor. BLIZZARD had brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: Curlin Pearls
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Blizzard
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp break, angled 2w, took charge top lane, much the best,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Daniel J. Yates & Patricia J. Yates

ENTRY.NAME: Snowbird
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 4path, improved position 5path upper stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Saltmakeshersweet
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace inside, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Whatdid I Buy
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 14000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 15 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 15 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SIMPLY VALID drifted in at the start, made the lead soon thereafter, set all the pace and drew off in the stretch under mild right handed urging. SMUDGE THE CAT stalked the pace into the stretch and was steadily gaining ground along the rail late in a determined effort. ON HIS TOES trailed into the stretch and found his best stride late two wide. LAKE TAHOE pressured the winner two wide into the stretch, drifted to the four path and weakened. FAST CALL close up early, faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Simply Valid
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted in start, quick lead, set pace, drew off, right urging

ENTRY.NAME: On His Toes
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, best stride late, 2 wide

ENTRY.NAME: Smudge the Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, gaining rail, good effort,

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Call
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Lake Tahoe
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, drifted 4path top lane, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 54. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FACT NOT FICTION was bumped at the start, made the lead soon thereafter, set the pace under pressure early, drew clear on the turn, widened rapidly under left handed urging in upper stretch and won in hand. IRONCLAD ALIBI was hustled along, moved up three wide on the turn and finished well clear for second in the five path. TADZIO was fractious in the gate, pressured the winner two wide early and dropped back on the stretch. ROMANIAN PRINCE bumped the winner at the start, settled close up along the inside, improved position in upper stretch and was outfinished for third. GRAY TORMENTOR void of early speed, trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Fact Not Fiction
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, quick lead, drew off, left urging, handily

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: WinStar Farm, LLC & Blazing Meadows Farm

ENTRY.NAME: Romanian Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, close inside, improved upper stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Tadzio
ENTRY.OWNER: Spicer, Richard and Spitler, D. William
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious in gate, pressed 2 wide, dropped back lane

ENTRY.NAME: Ironclad Alibi
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, middle move, 3 wide, clear second 5path

ENTRY.NAME: Gray Tormentor
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, trailed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 87. Claiming Purse 23600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 15 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 15 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LATIN SPICE pressed the pace two wide into the stretch, was carried out to the eight path by the leader through deep stretch and got up in the final strides. STATESBORO away alertly, set a pressured pace along the inside into the stretch, drifted out under left handle urging to the seven path through the final furlong and couldn't handle the winner. BREEZY MONEY stalked the pace three wide and went evenly. DISCLOSURE unhurried early, swung wide and closed a gap late out past the middle of the racetrack. FRANCO void early speed, found his best stride late inside. CUMBER was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Statesboro
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, drifted 6path, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Cumber
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Breezy Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Latin Spice
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, carried mid track, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Franco
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, best stride late, inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Disclosure
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, swung wide, late gain past mid track

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 90. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 23600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $12,500 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 15 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 15 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RED HOT LASS pressed the pace three wide into the far turn, made the lead at the quarter pole then widened the balance of the trip under strong handling to win going away. DUNVEGAN DOLL never far back, had a mild late rally in the five path and finished second best. LIBERTY BELLE loomed boldly along the rail before a half, matched strides to the quarter pole then was outfinished. MISS GOODBAR trailed into the far turn then passed tiring rivals inside. TIZ INDEPENDENCE close up along the inside, weakened in the lane. CANDY ISLAND away alertly, set a pressured pace two wide to the quarter pole then was used up. COURTLY had speed for a half then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Liberty Belle
ENTRY.COMMENT: loomed boldly inside backstretch, battled 1/4pole, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Red Hot Lass
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, took charge 1/4 pole, drew off,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Pope McLean, Marc McLean, Pope McLeanJr. & Taproot Bloodst

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz Independence
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up inside, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Dunvegan Doll
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late rally, 5path, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Goodbar
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Candy Island
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace 1/4 pole, 2 wide, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Courtly
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed half, stopped,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 44. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RADIO SILENT pressed the pace four then three wide into the turn, made the lead nearing the quarter pole, drifted to the four path and finished full of run under right handed urging to win as much the best. AFTER SUNRISE never far back, rallied through deep stretch along the rail and got up for second. VECCHI away alertly, set a pressured pace two wide for nearly a half then was outfinished three wide. ROLL ON BIG O was fractious in the gate, pressed the pace along the inside early and was outfinished four wide. ONE STEP ASIDE raced inside and had a mild late rally then lacked room nearing the wire while two wide. MOBIL MISSION broke slowly and was no threat. RIVERS OF DENIRO had speed outside through the turn then weakened. JODHPUR vied for the early lead four wide and was through after a half. UNLIMITED LUCK was never close, lost contact on the turn, was eased to the wire and walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Mobil Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Vecchi
ENTRY.OWNER: Spicer, Richard and Spitler, D. William
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Unlimited Luck
ENTRY.COMMENT: never close, lost contact turn, eased wire, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Roll On Big O
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious in gate, pressed pace, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: One Step Aside
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip, nor room wire 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: After Sunrise
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late rally, inside, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Jodhpur
ENTRY.OWNER: Spicer, Richard and Spitler, D. William
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 4 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Rivers of Deniro
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Radio Silent
ENTRY.OWNER: Winblaze LLC and Forward and Left Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 4-3wide, took charge 1/4 pole, drew off,
